summary.span: 表示用于填充 和更新数据源的一组数据命令和一个数据库连接。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 充当用于检索和保存数据的 与数据源之间的桥梁。The serves as a bridge between a and data source for retrieving and saving data. 通过使用 将数据从数据源加载到 来提供此桥，并使用 将在 中所做的更改发送回数据源。The provides this bridge by using to load data from the data source into the , and using to send changes made in the back to the data source. 当 填充 时，它将为返回的数据创建相应的表和列（如果它们尚不存在）。When the fills a , it will create the appropriate tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 但是，除非 属性设置为 ，否则不会在隐式创建的架构中包含主键信息。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 你还可以在使用 填充数据之前， 创建 的架构（包括主键信息）。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using . 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset). 请注意，某些 OLE DB 提供程序（包括 MSDataShape 提供程序）不返回基表或主键信息。Note that some OLE DB providers, including the MSDataShape provider, do not return base table or primary key information. 因此， 无法正确设置任何创建的 上的 属性。Therefore, the cannot correctly set the property on any created . 在这些情况下，应在 中显式指定表的主键。In these cases you should explicitly specify primary keys for tables in the . 还包括 、、、和 属性，以便于加载和更新数据。The also includes the , , , , and properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data. 创建 的实例时，属性将设置为其初始值。When you create an instance of , properties are set to their initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 、 和 从 Access 数据源中选择记录，并使用所选行填充 。The following example uses the , and , to select records from an Access data source, and populate a with the selected rows. 然后返回填充的 。The filled is then returned. 为实现此目的，该方法传递了一个初始化的 、一个连接字符串和一个 SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 的实现将打开并关闭 （如果尚未打开）。This implementation of the opens and closes an if it is not already open. 这在必须为两个或多个 对象调用 方法的应用程序中非常有用。This can be useful in an application that must call the method for two or more objects. 如果 已经打开，则必须显式调用 或**Dispose**才能将其关闭。If the is already open, you must explicitly call or **Dispose** to close it. 创建 的实例时，以下读/写属性将设置为以下初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改其中任一属性的值。You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的此重载使用 `selectConnectionString` 参数设置 属性。This overload of the constructor uses the `selectConnectionString` parameter to set the property. 但是，它不会打开连接。However, it does not open the connection. 你仍必须显式打开连接。You still must explicitly open the connection. 创建 的实例时，以下读/写属性将设置为以下初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或存储过程，用于从数据集中删除记录。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure for deleting records from the data set.

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，用以删除数据源中与 中已删除的行相对应的记录。

span.span: An used during to delete records in the data source that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 期间，如果未设置此属性，并且 中存在主键信息，则在设置 属性并使用 时，可以自动生成 。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，会生成未设置的任何其他命令。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此代逻辑要求密钥列信息存在于 中。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). 将 分配给之前创建的 时，不会克隆 。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的 对象的引用。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并设置 和 属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActiveX 数据对象（ADO）与 ADO.NET 之间的链接是一种单向操作，你可以将数据从 ADO 复制到 ，但对数据的任何更新都必须由 ADO.NET 进行处理。The link between ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) and ADO.NET is a one-way operation in that you can copy data from ADO to the , but any updates to the data must be handled by ADO.NET. 方法通过对 `Recordset`调用 `NextRecordset` 方法来循环访问多个结果，并在 操作完成后关闭输入 `Recordset`。The method iterates through multiple results by calling the `NextRecordset` method on the `Recordset`, closing the input `Recordset` on completion of the operation. 操作将行添加到 中的指定目标 对象中，如果该对象尚不存在，则创建 该对象。The operation adds the rows to the specified destination object in the , creating the object if it does not already exist. 创建 对象时， 操作通常只创建列名称元数据。When you create a object, the operation ordinarily creates only column name metadata. 但是，如果 属性设置为 `AddWithKey`，则还会创建相应的主键和约束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果主键信息存在，则会对所有重复行进行协调，并且仅在对应于 的 中出现一次。If primary key information is present, any duplicate rows are reconciled and only appear one time in the that corresponds to the . 可以通过 、指定 的 属性或将 属性设置为 `AddWithKey`来设置主键信息。Primary key information may be set either through , by specifying the property of the , or by setting the property to `AddWithKey`. 若要使用 OLE DB 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序正常运行，`AddWithKey` 要求本机 OLE DB 提供程序通过设置 DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS 属性来获取所需的主键信息，然后通过检查**IColumnsRowset**中的 DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN 来确定哪些列是主键列。To function correctly with the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB, `AddWithKey` requires the native OLE DB provider to obtain required primary key information by setting the DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS property, and then determine which columns are primary key columns by examining DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN in the **IColumnsRowset**. 或者，用户可以在每个 上显式设置 primary key 约束。Alternatively the user may explicitly set the primary key constraints on each . 这将确保对与现有记录匹配的传入记录进行更新，而不是追加。This ensures that incoming records that match existing records are updated instead of appended. 如果 返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果，则 `DataAdapter` 不会为生成的 设置 值。If the returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 必须显式定义主键，以确保正确解析重复行。You must explicitly define the primary key to make sure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys). 如果 `Recordset` 在 操作开始之前关闭，则不会产生错误。If the `Recordset` is closed before the starting of the operation, no error results. 这是处理多个结果所必需的，因为不返回行的查询通过关闭的 `Recordset`来指示。This is required for handling of multiple results, because queries that do not return rows are indicated by a closed `Recordset`. 只调用关闭 `Recordset` 上的 `NextRecordset` 并继续处理。The just calls `NextRecordset` on the closed `Recordset` and continues processing. 如果在填充数据集时遇到错误，则在出现错误之前添加的行将保留在 中。If an error is encountered while populating the data set, rows added before the occurrence of the error remain in the . 操作的其余部分将中止。The rest of the operation is aborted. 如果 对象在填充 时遇到重复的列，则它将使用模式 "*columnname*1"、"*columnname*2"、"*columnname*3" 等来为后续列生成名称。If the object encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on. 如果传入数据包含未命名列，则这些列将按照模式 "Column1"、"Column2" 等放置在 中。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 当将多个结果集添加到 时，每个结果集将放在一个单独的表中。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 附加的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名来命名（例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2" 等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.). 使用列名称和表名称的应用程序应确保不会与这些命名模式发生冲突。Applications that use column and table names should make sure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. ADO `Recordset` 或 `Record` 对象的值将转换为 中存储的公共语言运行时类型。Values in ADO `Recordset` or `Record` objects are converted to common language runtime types for storage in the . > [!NOTE] > 当填充操作完成时， 方法的此重载将隐式调用 ADO 对象上的 `Close`。This overload of the method implicitly calls `Close` on the ADO object when the fill operation is complete. 下面的示例使用 使用 ado `Record` 对象的 ADO `Recordset` 来填充 。The following example uses an to fill a using an ADO `Recordset` that is an ADO `Record` object. 此示例假设已创建 ADO `RecordSet` 和 `Record` 对象。This example assumes that you have created an ADO `RecordSet` and `Record` object. ```vb Dim custDA As OleDbDataAdapter = New OleDbDataAdapter() Dim custDS As DataSet = New DataSet 'Use ADO objects from ADO library (msado15.dll) imported ' as.NET library ADODB.dll using TlbImp.exe Dim adoConn As ADODB.Connection = New ADODB.Connection() Dim adoRS As ADODB.Recordset = New ADODB.Recordset() adoConn.Open("Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=Northwind;Integrated Security=SSPI;", "", "", -1) adoRS.Open("SELECT * FROM Customers", adoConn, ADODB.CursorTypeEnum.adOpenForwardOnly, ADODB.LockTypeEnum.adLockReadOnly, 1) custDA.Fill(custDS, adoRS, "Customers") adoConn.Close() ``` ```csharp OleDbDataAdapter custDA = new OleDbDataAdapter(); DataSet custDS = new DataSet(); //Use ADO objects from ADO library (msado15.dll) imported // as.NET library ADODB.dll using TlbImp.exe ADODB.Connection adoConn = new ADODB.Connection(); ADODB.Recordset adoRS = new ADODB.Recordset(); adoConn.Open("Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=Northwind;Integrated Security=SSPI;", "", "", -1); adoRS.Open("SELECT * FROM Customers", adoConn, ADODB.CursorTypeEnum.adOpenForwardOnly, ADODB.LockTypeEnum.adLockReadOnly, 1); custDA.Fill(custDS, adoRS, "Customers"); adoConn.Close(); ```

span.span: The source table is invalid.

summary.span: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或用于将新记录插入数据源的存储过程。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to insert new records into the data source.

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，用于将与 中的新行相对应的记录插入到数据源中。

span.span: An used during to insert records in the data source that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 期间，如果未设置此属性，并且 中存在主键信息，则在设置 属性并使用 时，可以自动生成 。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，会生成未设置的任何其他命令。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此代逻辑要求密钥列信息存在于 中。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). 将 分配给之前创建的 时，不会克隆 。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的 对象的引用。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令将返回行，则可能会将这些行添加到 ，具体取决于如何设置 对象的 属性。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending on how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并设置 和 属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令后的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during after a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 尝试进行更新。

span.span: The attempt to update is made.

summary.span: 因此，事件发生。

span.span: Therefore, the event occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 时，每个更新的数据行发生两个事件。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值将移至参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果命令设置为 `FirstReturnedRecord`，则返回的第一个结果将放置在 中。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果有输出参数，它们会置于 中。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了正在使用的 和 事件。The following example shows the and events being used. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An that is used during to select records from data source for placement in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 分配给之前创建的 时，不会克隆 。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 维护对先前创建的 对象的引用。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果 未返回任何行，则不会将任何表添加到 ，也不会引发异常。If the returns no rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并设置 和 属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes that you have already created an object.
